text:
James Hong (traditional Chinese: 吳漢章, Wú Hànzhāng; born February 22, 1929) is an American stand-up comedian, actor, voice artist, and comedian. He is known as the voice of Mr. Ping in the "Kung Fu Panda" franchise.
Family.
Hong and his family came out in an around-the-world mountain biking travel adventure called. The Hong family rode their mountain bikes on a trail near the Hollywood sign. James' daughter named April was born in 1975.
